title: Australian woman dies after mishap on ski lift in Japan's Nagano Prefecture

title: Four Countries In Europe In Adjusting To New Travel Guidelines From Canada’s Super Visa
desc: Switzerland joins Ireland, Poland, Norway, Spain, Germany, France, and more than forty-four countries in Europe in facing tough travel challenges as Canada unveils its new Super Visa program due to the indefinite closure of the Parents and Grandparents Program (PGP).
